name: cANa_dANger
description:
This game was made for the University of Europe with instruction from Professor Csongor Baranyai. 

It's a continuation from the game Cana Project made with the students Corinna, Alan, Naru (Me) and Anton: Press here to go to the page of the game and see its credits. 

This time around I re-coded the game to become fit the theme of The End of the world, but everything related to it (which would be lore related) didn't work out the way expected.

This game is a part of the game-a-week course,
